commit.message:
configure: Regenerate.

2005-04-29  Paolo Bonzini  <bonzini@gnu.org>

	* configure: Regenerate.

config:
2005-04-29  Paolo Bonzini  <bonzini@gnu.org>

	* acx.m4 (ACX_PROG_GNAT): Remove stray break.

From-SVN: r98985

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,7 @@
+2005-04-29  Paolo Bonzini  <bonzini@gnu.org>
+
+	* configure: Regenerate.
+
 2005-04-27  Mike Stump  <mrs@apple.com>
 
 	* MAINTAINERS: Add self as darwin maintainer.

@@ -1,6 +1,10 @@
+2005-04-29  Paolo Bonzini  <bonzini@gnu.org>
+
+	* acx.m4 (ACX_PROG_GNAT): Remove stray break.
+
 2005-03-31  Paolo Bonzini  <bonzini@gnu.org>
 
-	* config/gcc-lib-path.m4: Remove.
+	* gcc-lib-path.m4: Remove.
 
 2005-03-21  Zack Weinberg  <zack@codesourcery.com>

@@ -212,7 +212,6 @@ acx_cv_cc_gcc_supports_ada=no
 errors=`(${CC} -c conftest.adb) 2>&1 || echo failure`
 if test x"$errors" = x && test -f conftest.$ac_objext; then
   acx_cv_cc_gcc_supports_ada=yes
-  break
 fi
 rm -f conftest.*])

@@ -2117,7 +2117,6 @@ acx_cv_cc_gcc_supports_ada=no
 errors=`(${CC} -c conftest.adb) 2>&1 || echo failure`
 if test x"$errors" = x && test -f conftest.$ac_objext; then
   acx_cv_cc_gcc_supports_ada=yes
-  break
 fi
 rm -f conftest.*
 fi
@@ -2131,7 +2130,7 @@ else
 fi
 
 echo $ac_n "checking how to compare bootstrapped objects""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:2135: checking how to compare bootstrapped objects" >&5
+echo "configure:2134: checking how to compare bootstrapped objects" >&5
 if eval "test \"`echo '$''{'gcc_cv_prog_cmp_skip'+set}'`\" = set"; then
   echo $ac_n "(cached) $ac_c" 1>&6
 else
@@ -2229,9 +2228,9 @@ saved_CFLAGS="$CFLAGS"
 CFLAGS="$CFLAGS $gmpinc"
 # Check GMP actually works
 echo $ac_n "checking for correct version of gmp.h""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:2233: checking for correct version of gmp.h" >&5
+echo "configure:2232: checking for correct version of gmp.h" >&5
 cat > conftest.$ac_ext <<EOF
-#line 2235 "configure"
+#line 2234 "configure"
 #include "confdefs.h"
 #include "gmp.h"
 int main() {
@@ -2242,7 +2241,7 @@ choke me
 
 ; return 0; }
 EOF
-if { (eval echo configure:2246: \"$ac_compile\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_compile) 2>&5; }; then
+if { (eval echo configure:2245: \"$ac_compile\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_compile) 2>&5; }; then
   rm -rf conftest*
   echo "$ac_t""yes" 1>&6
 else
@@ -2255,20 +2254,20 @@ rm -f conftest*
 
 if test x"$have_gmp" = xyes; then
   echo $ac_n "checking for MPFR""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:2259: checking for MPFR" >&5
+echo "configure:2258: checking for MPFR" >&5
 
   saved_LIBS="$LIBS"
   LIBS="$LIBS $gmplibs"
   cat > conftest.$ac_ext <<EOF
-#line 2264 "configure"
+#line 2263 "configure"
 #include "confdefs.h"
 #include <gmp.h>
 #include <mpfr.h>
 int main() {
 mpfr_t n; mpfr_init(n);
 ; return 0; }
 EOF
-if { (eval echo configure:2272: \"$ac_link\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_link) 2>&5; } && test -s conftest${ac_exeext}; then
+if { (eval echo configure:2271: \"$ac_link\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_link) 2>&5; } && test -s conftest${ac_exeext}; then
   rm -rf conftest*
   echo "$ac_t""yes" 1>&6
 else
@@ -2755,7 +2754,7 @@ do
 # Extract the first word of "$ac_prog", so it can be a program name with args.
 set dummy $ac_prog; ac_word=$2
 echo $ac_n "checking for $ac_word""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:2759: checking for $ac_word" >&5
+echo "configure:2758: checking for $ac_word" >&5
 if eval "test \"`echo '$''{'ac_cv_prog_CONFIGURED_BISON'+set}'`\" = set"; then
   echo $ac_n "(cached) $ac_c" 1>&6
 else
